subject: p19075045
Findings: Comparison is made with prior study,. Enlarged left effusion is minimally increased, allowing for difference in positing of the patient. Lines and tubes are in unchanged standard position. There are low lung volumes. Cardiomegaly is stable. Widened mediastinum has minimally increased. Right lower lobe atelectasis has markedly improved. There is no pneumothorax. Right shoulder arthroplasty is again noted. Left upper lobe opacity is unchanged. Mild vascular congestion is stable.
